622240.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 5 (Token Pack)
622240.description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 5

This product depicts 56 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Bandits both male and female, Orcs, Ogres, Merchants both male and female, Bullfrog Men, Lizardfolk, Giant Frogs, Giant Lizards, Veterans both male and female and a Troll.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 13 Bandits
  • 8 Bullywugs
  • Female Veteran
  • Female Elf Merchant
  • 5 Giant Frogs
  • 3 Giant Lizards
  • 8 Lizardfolk
  • Male Cook
  • Male Dwarf Veteran
  • Male Dwarf Merchant
  • 2 Male Human Merchants
  • 3 Ogres
  • 5 Orcs
  • Orc Boss
  • Troll
  • 2 Covered and Hiteched Wagons
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
